articles.title: Real Madrid 'consider offering Eden Hazard plus money to sign Liverpool star Mo Salah' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The LaLiga side have long been admirers of Salah who is still yet to resolve his contract situation at Liverpool. Real Madrid are said to be considering an ambitious move for the Egyptian winger.
articles.content:
Real Madrid are reportedly considering an ambitious move in an attempt to persuade Liverpool to sell star player Mo Salah.

articles.title: Chelsea should consider offering Antonio Rudiger a new deal according to Robert Huth - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Blues defender is out of contract next summer but has already turned down a new deal worth around £125,000 from the European champions, with Real Madrid and Bayern Munich interested.
articles.content:
Former Chelsea defender Robert Huth has hinted that his former side should give in to Antonio Rudiger's contract demands if they have to pay more to replace him.
